description:
沪江英乐：英伦创作才女 Anna Calvi 新单《Piece By Piece》！冷艳而凌厉的吉他，犹如高潮时的欢愉，指尖奏出的危险让人甘愿俯身品尝。果断循环，歌风低沉迷幻妖娆，歌手吉他技术也不赖哦!

【Anna Calvi 新单《Piece By Piece》】

歌词：

I remember your silver ring
On the black and white keys falling
And the colour and the shape of your hand
As you point at the paintings you don't hang

I will forget, piece by piece
I will forget, piece by piece
Into the dark, piece by piece
Into the air, piece by piece

Oh sun and moon
Are waiting here
For you to rise
And disappear now

I will forget, piece by piece
I will forget, piece by piece
Into the air, piece by piece
I will forget, piece by piece

Love you can stay
The scent on my collar
The colour will fade
And all that is worthless
The trace and decay
It leaves me with worthless love

I will forget, piece by piece
I will forget, piece by piece
I will forget, piece by piece
I will forget, piece by piece
I will forget, piece by piece
I will forget, piece by piece
I will forget, piece by piece
I will forget, piece by piece
